document_data.name: Gold Cave
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gold Cave''' was the best place to acquire equipment in [[Elventree]] around [[1367 DR]]. It was named because it was where most [[gold]] was exchanged in the town.
document_data.Description: The Gold Cave was actually setup within a natural cave in Elventree.
document_data.Inhabitants: The shop was run by a [[half-elf]] named [[Amaril Sweetwater]]. Though limited in what she carried, Amaril kept her store well-stocked for the basic gear [[adventurer]]s required.
